function FancyInput(props, ref) {

    focus: () => {
      inputRef.current.focus();

}

import React, { useRef } from 'react';

interface ChildProps {

const ChildComponent = React.forwardRef<HTMLInputElement, ChildProps>((props, ref) => {

  return (
    <div>
      <input ref={ref} />
      <span>{message}</span>
      {children}
    </div>
  );
});

const ParentComponent = () => {
